name: AstroVector
description:
Where am I? Why am I all that's left? How will I ever get home? These questions lie on the mind of a stranded Federation member who wakes up all alone in a mysterious space station.

Take up your space suit and survive in a desolate galaxy full of strange sights and stories. Craft items along the way and discover the secrets of an alien species who lived here long ago. The Rosin Federation may be gone, but their legacy lives on in you. Make them proud and maybe you'll escape the galaxy.
